channel.title: Introduction: Content Koala
channel.description:
Hi All,
I've just discovered this community through Indie Hackers.
To share what I'm up to, I'm working on Content Koala. We create blog posts for businesses for a small monthly subscription.
I was tired of companies off-shoring content and getting back dross, so I went ahead and created something I'd want to use myself. Check us out and let me know if you have any feedback :+1:
